name: h265web.js
description: H.265/Hevc Web端播放器，支持H.265编码的mp4/hls/m3u8/mpegts 的媒体播放，支持点播、直播。A Hevc Web Player , support file type: mp4/hls/m3u8/mpegts, support play type: vod/live。Github:https://github.com/numberwolf/h265web.js
author: numberwolf - changyanlong

scripts.start: cp src/decoder/missile.wasm ./dist/missile.wasm && cp src/demuxer/missilets.wasm ./dist/missilets.wasm && cp -r src/assets dist && browserify src/h265webjs.js -o ./dist/h265webjs_tmp.js && terser ./dist/h265webjs_tmp.js -c pure_funcs=[console.log],toplevel=true -m -o ./dist/h265webjs.js && rm ./dist/h265webjs_tmp.js
